title: bishdankillmavibe looking for three bronze/silver studs
body:
Hi.
My friend swaggy mcfly and I are looking for some new friends to chillbang with in ranked 5's.

TO BE A PART OF OUR CULT YOU MUST:
-play with swag
-not feed enemy zed

If you can do these things, please apply. (unless you main zed, those are never good people)

TOP: OPEN
JG: OPEN
MID: lswagmasterl
ADC: swaggy mcfly
SUPP: OPEN

Roles can change but I like to play LB and shizz, so yeah. I can JG if we have a keen as pie mid laner. 
Support must be kinda good (for a bronzie anyway) so that swaggy's rage is kept to a minimum.
When we get to worlds (probs next season) I get to be the captain.

If we are good we can probably convince my Korean friend to join, he's a bit like faker but better.

Leave a comment or add me or however this works.
Much love brothers.
SWAGMASTER

replies.body: Hey, can I join if I use my bronze accounterino
support mid jungle, i can do em all. added you both.
